text: A subpoena issued by a Clerk of Superior Court under § 13-443 shall be served in compliance with § 11-942 and applicable rules of the Superior Court for the service of subpoenas.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-147, see notes following § 13-441.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 4 of the Uniform Interstate Depositions and Discovery Act. See Vol. 13, Pt. II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 13-444

Current through December 11, 2012

chapter.text: Interstate Depositions and Discovery; Uniform Act. (Refs & Annos)
